axis_supply.supply_status: Strained - Division recently retreated from Sidi Barrani to Bardia (December 1940). Supply lines from Tripoli stretched (1,800+ km). Fuel deliveries irregular, ammunition stocks adequate for defensive operations but declining. Water from Bardia wells adequate. Food supplies moderate (15-20 days). No indication of imminent collapse but sustainability questionable for extended operations. Supply situation will deteriorate rapidly once British besiege Bardia.

allied_supply.supply_status: Adequate for East Africa deployment and initial operations. Division still completing mobilization and training in theater. Supply lines from Mombasa port to forward positions in northern Kenya operational but challenged by poor road infrastructure and long distances. Water supply critical constraint in semi-arid border regions. Main concern: completing equipment deliveries from South Africa.
